children.text: Copy can be too verbose (as in having too many words), blatantly boring (as in not being interesting enough to keep the reader hooked), or sound unprofessional (as in not being clear, cogent or concise).
But as an editor or critic, it helps to communicate that if you…
a) Actually know what you’re talking about. b) Can provide examples to prove your point.
